doc.title: Pseudo-class

value.content: In CSS, a pseudo-class selector targets elements depending on their state rather than on information from the document tree. For example, the selector a:visited applies styles only to links that the user has already followed.

doc.summary: In CSS, a pseudo-class selector targets elements depending on their state rather than on information from the document tree. For example, the selector a:visited applies styles only to links that the user has already followed.
